column2: Consumer prices rose 6.8% in November, as compared to the same month in 2020, according to data from the Labor Department released in December. U.S. inflation is now at a 39-year-high, and November marked the fifth month in a row that inflation was over 5%. Here’s what Warren Buffett has said over the decades. The Chairman and CEO of Berkshire Hathaway, during a 2015 shareholder meeting, noted that: “The best businesses during inflation are the businesses that you buy once and then you don’t have to keep making capital investments subsequently,” while you should avoid “any business with heavy capital investment.”
